content: TORONTO  Nov 24 More than 80 percent of Kirkland Lake Gold shareholders have voted in favor of the mid-tier miner's takeover of Newmarket Gold  according to two sources familiar with the situation  marking the end of a contentious process.

title: UPDATE 1-Kirkland Lake shareholders vote for Newmarket takeover -sources
